shri dalada wandanawabuduhamuduruwo ipadune shri lankawedaruwoanagarika dharmapalathumaobe daruwata waradi karanna idahala witabuddhangala aaranya senasanayapallepola weluwanarama wiharayachiran jiwathu ambaagamuwe soratha himinawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawadhanawathkama ha ugathkama thibunath hithe sathutak nahaganegama saranankara nahimibuduhamuduruwo shreshtathama prathipaththiya penwu nayakayanoyisathuten ma sitina thanaththan bhikshun wahanseyikam sapayata wahal wu raja bisawalama gi saha kawinawalapitiya shri sudharma daham pasalaapi wemu sirilaka bodu daruwoa.po.sa sa/pela buddha dharma padam malawamishanari uwadurata goduru wu koriyanu budusasuna‚Äúaaloko udapadi‚Äù prahelika anka 01 jayagrahikawoajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansepasal guruwarayaku lesa mage athdakimsathuta labime mangadharma sakachchaanawabodha wiwahayan nisa gabsakaraganim wadiwelawadi wadath narakayisitha yanu lokayayiwaradi kala aya siragewalwalata yawimaparamithanuwanathi baluralalowada sangarawasakman bhawanawasonaka nam wu dilindu tharunayage dhaja pujawasarwa nirdoshi wenna haduwoth pidanaya wadiyiatasilbalagalla saraswathi piriwenaadawanawita ajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansege namaya mulu lokayema prachalithaya.
